title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka
description: Help provide warm jackets and blankets to families in Dhaka suffering from extreme cold.

title: Blankets for Chittagong Hills
description: Donate blankets to families living in the chilly Chittagong Hill Tracts.

title: Support Sylhet Villages
description: Provide winter clothing to underprivileged families in Sylhet.

title: Clothing Drive for Rajshahi
description: Ensure warmth for the vulnerable communities in Rajshahi by donating winter essentials.

title: Winter Relief in Khulna
description: Your donations will help protect the poor in Khulna from the freezing weather.

title: Help Barisal Stay Warm
description: Donate sweaters and socks to children and elderly in Barisal who need your help.
